channel.title: economic outlook 2013 – Angry Bear
channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: CBO 2013 Economic Outlook: Soc Sec Trust Funds
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: By request of frequent AB commenter and SS contrarian Bruce Krasting. He claims vindication of claims from four years ago that the Trust Funds would top out at a much lower level than then estimated. And there is some support to be had here. Also lots of numbers and data points. I’ll have my say […]
item.content:encoded: By request of frequent AB commenter and SS contrarian Bruce Krasting. He claims vindication of claims from four years ago that the Trust Funds would top out at a much lower level than then estimated. And there is some support to be had here. Also lots of numbers and data points. I’ll have my say in comments, over to you all.
